import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { nav =[ {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-48 (1).png", h:"work"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-48 (2).png", h:"entertainment"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-48 (3).png", h:"family"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-48 (4).png", h:"study"} ] }
